DOC.brief_summary: Multi-national, randomized, phase III, GCIG Intergroup study comparing pegylated liposomal Doxorubicin (CAELYX) and Carboplatin vs. Paclitaxel and Carboplatin in patients with epithelial ovarian cancer in late relapse. (CALYPSO)
DOC.brief_title: Multi-national, Randomized, Phase III, GCIG Intergroup Study Comparing Pegylated Liposomal Doxorubicin (CAELYX) and Carboplatin vs. Paclitaxel and Carboplatin in Patients With Epithelial Ovarian Cancer in Late Relapse. (CALYPSO)
DOC.criteria: Patients with epithelial Ovarian cancer in late relapse
